inaccuracy.explanation: Distortion metrics scale linearly with the log of inaccuracy. Is Robustness the Cost of Accuracy? A comprehensive Study on the Robustness of 18 Deep Image Classification Models

data-dimensionality.explanation: Dimensionality of Data correlates to its robustness against adversarial attacks.
